response.overview: Fernay McPherson, owner of the popular East Bay eatery Minnie Bell’s Soul Movement, grew up working in the family kitchen alongside her grandmother Lilllie and great aunt Minnie Bell. This spring McPherson honors her lineage by opening Minnie Bell’s in the Fillmore, a neighborhood with deep family roots. “I think I’m still processing the fact that we’re coming home,” says McPherson.  Learn more at www.minniebellssoul.com
response.tagline: “I think I’m still processing the fact that we’re coming home,” says McPherson.
response.title: Minnie Bell's Soul Movement
